attributes.action: fulfill the Bill Of Rights, from the year 1689. And to stop hiding the rightfull heir to the throne from the people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Blair and Mr Brown promise you all that everything will change but they only promise. This is petition is to make the Prime Minister Mr Gordon Brown fulfill the Bill Of Rights and for him to behave according to the law. It is about that the we all want a better Great Britain. The means are there but they must not be blocked.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
